content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":114641,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっと腕を前に突きだしてみろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Try sticking your arm out forward a bit.\""},{"lineNumber":114642,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……こうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Like this?\""},{"lineNumber":114643,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よいせーっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heave-ho!\""},{"lineNumber":114644,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐいーっとランスがサテラの腕を引っ張る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance gave Satella's arm a strong pull."},{"lineNumber":114645,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":114646,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜むにゅーん＞","translatedEnglishLine":"〈Munyūn〉 (sound effect of something soft stretching or squishing)"},{"lineNumber":114647,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んなっ、ああっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nnngh, ah!?"},{"lineNumber":114648,"originalJapaneseLine":"腕を引っ張られたことで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Because her arm was pulled,"},{"lineNumber":114649,"originalJapaneseLine":"裸のサテラがランスの背に抱きつく形となった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Naked Satella ended up hugging Lance's back."},{"lineNumber":114650,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、やはりタオルはこれが一番！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, after all, this towel is the best!"},{"lineNumber":114651,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そーれ、ぬーるぬーる」","translatedEnglishLine":"Here we go, all slippery slippery.\""},{"lineNumber":114652,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひんっ、んっ――！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hnngh, nnngh――!\""},{"lineNumber":114653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んんんんんんんんんん！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nnnnnnnnnnnn!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":114654,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの背に抱きついたまま、","translatedEnglishLine":"Still hugging Lance's back,"},{"lineNumber":114655,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラはぷるぷると震え――","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella trembled all over—"},{"lineNumber":114656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふにゃあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Funyaah...\""},{"lineNumber":114657,"originalJapaneseLine":"くったりと脱力した。","translatedEnglishLine":"She went limp with exhaustion."},{"lineNumber":114658,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お？　どした、サテラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? What's wrong, Satella?\""},{"lineNumber":114659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、こ、こ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ko, ko, ko...\""},{"lineNumber":114660,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この馬鹿ーーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You idiotーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":114661,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":114662,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜こきゃっ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"〈Kokya〉 (sound effect of a neck cracking or twisting)"},{"lineNumber":114663,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐぇぷーーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guepーーー!?"},{"lineNumber":114664,"originalJapaneseLine":"見事にサテラの首締めがキマった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella's chokehold landed perfectly."},{"lineNumber":114665,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラ様ノ為、シーザー戦ウ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For Lady Satella, Caesar will fight!\""},{"lineNumber":114666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よう、シーザー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yo, Caesar."},{"lineNumber":114667,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相変わらず目立つなお前は」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're as conspicuous as ever.\""},{"lineNumber":114668,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんにちは、シーザーさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hello, Caesar-san.\""},{"lineNumber":114669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":114670,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーザーはランス達に顔を向けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Caesar turned his face toward Lance and the others."},{"lineNumber":114671,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、サテラを待ってるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it? Waiting for Satella?\""},{"lineNumber":114672,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":114673,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーザーがコクリと小さく頷く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Caesar gave a small nod."},{"lineNumber":114674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シーザー、待テト言ワレタ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Caesar was told to wait."},{"lineNumber":114675,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ダカラ、待ツ」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, he waits.\""},{"lineNumber":114676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":114677,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも今日は日差しが強いから辛いですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But the sun is strong today, so it's tough."},{"lineNumber":114678,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はい、この麦わら帽子をかぶって下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, please wear this straw hat.\""},{"lineNumber":114679,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":114680,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……アリガトウ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Thank you.\""},{"lineNumber":114681,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're welcome.\""},{"lineNumber":114682,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーい、シィル。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Sheel."},{"lineNumber":114683,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつまでそんな石くれに構ってる気だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"How long do you intend to pay attention to that rock?\""},{"lineNumber":114684,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、はーい、待って下さいー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, y-yes, please wait a moment."},{"lineNumber":114685,"originalJapaneseLine":"　では、シーザーさん、また」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, Caesar-san, see you again.\""},{"lineNumber":114686,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":114687,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーザーはちょこちょこと","translatedEnglishLine":"Caesar fiddled around lightly"},{"lineNumber":114688,"originalJapaneseLine":"麦わら帽子の位置を直した。","translatedEnglishLine":"adjusting the position of his straw hat."},{"lineNumber":114689,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待たせたな、シーザー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry to keep you waiting, Caesar.\""},{"lineNumber":114690,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……って、なんだその帽子」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What’s with that hat?\""},{"lineNumber":114691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィルニ、貰イマシタ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sheel gave it to me.\""},{"lineNumber":114692,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":114693,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、やはりシーザーは何をつけても格好いいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, after all, Caesar looks cool no matter what he wears.\""},{"lineNumber":114694,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よく似合ってるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It suits you well.\""},{"lineNumber":114695,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":114696,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーザーはまたちょこちょこと","translatedEnglishLine":"Caesar again lightly"},{"lineNumber":114697,"originalJapaneseLine":"麦わら帽子の位置を直した。","translatedEnglishLine":"adjusted the position of his straw hat."},{"lineNumber":114698,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":114699,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーザーはちょっとだけ上機嫌……","translatedEnglishLine":"Caesar was just a little bit in a good mood..."},{"lineNumber":114700,"originalJapaneseLine":"に、サテラには見えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella could tell."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと腕を前に突きだしてみろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Try sticking your arm out forward a bit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐいーっとランスがサテラの腕を引っ張る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance gave Satella's arm a strong pull.
〈Munyūn〉 (sound effect of something soft stretching or squishing)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腕を引っ張られたことで、
裸のサテラがランスの背に抱きつく形となった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Naked Satella ended up hugging Lance's back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、やはりタオルはこれが一番！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha, after all, this towel is the best!
Here we go, all slippery slippery."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの背に抱きついたまま、
サテラはぷるぷると震え――

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 〈Kokya〉 (sound effect of a neck cracking or twisting)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見事にサテラの首締めがキマった。
「サテラ様ノ為、シーザー戦ウ！」
相変わらず目立つなお前は」
シーザーはランス達に顔を向けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caesar turned his face toward Lance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、サテラを待ってるのか？」
シーザーがコクリと小さく頷く。
「でも今日は日差しが強いから辛いですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But the sun is strong today, so it's tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、この麦わら帽子をかぶって下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, please wear this straw hat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつまでそんな石くれに構ってる気だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How long do you intend to pay attention to that rock?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、シーザーさん、また」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, Caesar-san, see you again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーザーはちょこちょこと
麦わら帽子の位置を直した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: adjusting the position of his straw hat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、やはりシーザーは何をつけても格好いいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, after all, Caesar looks cool no matter what he wears."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーザーはまたちょこちょこと
麦わら帽子の位置を直した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: adjusted the position of his straw hat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーザーはちょっとだけ上機嫌……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caesar was just a little bit in a good mood...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance gave Satella's arm a strong pull.
〈Munyūn〉 (sound effect of something soft stretching or squishing)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腕を引っ張られたことで、
裸のサテラがランスの背に抱きつく形となった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Naked Satella ended up hugging Lance's back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、やはりタオルはこれが一番！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha, after all, this towel is the best!
Here we go, all slippery slippery."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの背に抱きついたまま、
サテラはぷるぷると震え――

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 〈Kokya〉 (sound effect of a neck cracking or twisting)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見事にサテラの首締めがキマった。
「サテラ様ノ為、シーザー戦ウ！」
相変わらず目立つなお前は」
シーザーはランス達に顔を向けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caesar turned his face toward Lance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、サテラを待ってるのか？」
シーザーがコクリと小さく頷く。
「でも今日は日差しが強いから辛いですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But the sun is strong today, so it's tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、この麦わら帽子をかぶって下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, please wear this straw hat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつまでそんな石くれに構ってる気だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How long do you intend to pay attention to that rock?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、シーザーさん、また」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, Caesar-san, see you again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーザーはちょこちょこと
麦わら帽子の位置を直した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: adjusting the position of his straw hat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、やはりシーザーは何をつけても格好いいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, after all, Caesar looks cool no matter what he wears."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーザーはまたちょこちょこと
麦わら帽子の位置を直した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: adjusted the position of his straw hat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーザーはちょっとだけ上機嫌……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caesar was just a little bit in a good mood...
